comment: The antecedent provides a condition implying the converse of ~ 19.40 . This is to ~ 19.40 what ~ 19.33b is to ~ 19.33 . (Contributed by BJ, 6-May-2019.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-Nov-2020.)
